subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Penn State’s president, Rodney Erickson, said the university was adequately covered to handle lawsuits stemming from the child sexual abuse scandal but hoped to settle many of them “as quickly as possible.”
snippet: Penn State’s president, Rodney Erickson, said the university was adequately covered to handle lawsuits stemming from the child sexual abuse scandal but hoped to settle many of them “as quickly as possible.”
